nodes.text: The repeating blaster carbine was a short-range autofire weapon similar to a light repeating blaster. It could only shoot in autofire mode, firing multiple shots in rapid succession at a greater area instead of the more accurate single-shot mode. It had difficulty hitting targets at longer ranges, thus making it ineffective against distant targets.

A repeating blaster carbine required a power pack to operate; after 30 shots, the power pack needed to be replaced. The repeating blaster carbine cost 2,000 credits to purchase, but it was restricted to military use only.
